state.description: Parsing status (0 indicates failure, 1 indicates success).

text_type.description: Whether the input text is a word or a sentence.

component_list.description: The list of words and phrases that make up a sentence, and their translations in the current context.

component.description: The words and phrases that make up a sentence

start.description: The starting index of component in the source sentence

end.description: The end index of component in the source sentence

component_with_lemmatize.description: Tense or quantity restoration of words/phrases. E.G. 1) cars -> car 2) took away -> take away

translation.description: The translation of current component within the context of the sentence being translated.

word_class.description: Part of speech of the current component within the context of the sentence being translated.

word_parts.description: Word translation with part-of-speech tagging. Each part should include up to three translations.

word_class.description: Part of speech of the word to be translated. Must match component_list.word_class.

translations.description: Up to three translations for the current part of speech.
